bug.author: AKSHAYUBHAT
bug.summary: Replace Dropbox shared links with a different mechanism for distributing model weights.
bug.description: I have deleted Dropbox shared links used for distributing models, as a result this repo will stop working. I will update once I have decided on a new solution.

comments.comment: Hi, any update on this? regards.

A docker registry over IPFS? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/miguelmota/ipdr>https://github.com/miguelmota/ipdr</denchmark-link>
Then a few of us can host IPFS nodes. I can help set this up. Or just IPFS nodes. If mutable links are required we could use: <denchmark-link:https://docs.ipfs.io/guides/concepts/ipns/>https://docs.ipfs.io/guides/concepts/ipns/</denchmark-link>

I will share a gzip file containing all model weights etc. essentially everything that was previously distributed over Dropbox. Along with a change to codebase that allows specifying a source for download. Hopefully should have it by end of the 2019.
Hi, any updates for the weights files? I'm wondering if there is a separate docker service for OCR?
hey sorry still working on this

What about just put the gzip file containing all models (without code changes for downloading etc.) as a stop-gap solution? Without model files, the repo is not usable, really eager to try the repo out now.
Sure let me post link to all sources. All models are taken from other projects so this should be pretty easy
That's great, I supposed you have not posted it yet?
Please email me if you would like to get the zip file with the model.
Hi. I'd like to have the models to get the project work please. Thanks.
hey, mind sening me the zip file of the models, thanks ~
